text: {"fixed_xml":"<file name=\"line_1.json\"><content><![CDATA[{\n  \"xml_string\": \"<ITEM>37. <BIBL><TITLE>Eine Tossanische Bibel</TITLE></BIBL></ITEM>\"\n}]]></content></file>","number_of_corrections":3,"explanation":"The original XML was not well-formed because it contained JSON data directly inside the <file> element. To fix this, I added a <content> element to wrap the JSON data and used CDATA to escape the JSON content so it doesn't interfere with the XML parsing. Additionally, I properly closed all the tags and ensured the XML is well-formed."}

parsed.explanation: The original XML was not well-formed because it contained JSON data directly inside the <file> element. To fix this, I added a <content> element to wrap the JSON data and used CDATA to escape the JSON content so it doesn't interfere with the XML parsing. Additionally, I properly closed all the tags and ensured the XML is well-formed.
